text:
I receive an error...
Parent: child process exited with status 3221225477 -- Restarting.
After about 2/3rds of the page is displayed to client. 
OpSys WinXP-Pro (current)
1gb memory
Help??
creator: robert@mcadamsfamily.com

text:
Have you installed Windows XP Service Pack 1?

See

http://nagoya.apache.org/mirror/httpd/binaries/win32/#xpbug

Please review the other Windows-specific issues on that page.
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
I receive an error...
Parent: child process exited with status 3221225477 -- Restarting.
Accessing several sites, but www.espn.com is as good as any URL.
Running Apache 2.0.45 on Windows Server 2000 SP3, 256MB Memory.
Most of the sites I visit the proxy works just fine (google, yahoo, etc.).  
Only having trouble on some of them.
creator: wbwiltshire@hotmail.com

text:
We too are receiving the same error....

Using Apache 2.0.45 with mod_proxy on Win2K SP3 256 MB RAM.  The load is on the 
server as this is the gateway proxy and is configured with 450 worker threads.  
Downstream Trend Micro WebManager (web filter) uses this proxy to send requests 
to the Internet.

Here is the excerpt from the error log file....
----------------------------------------------------------
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:05 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:05 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 564
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:06 2003] [notice] Child 564: Child process is running
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:06 2003] [notice] Child 564: Acquired the start mutex.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:06 2003] [notice] Child 564: Starting 450 worker threads.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:06 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:06 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 2772
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:07 2003] [notice] Child 2772: Child process is running
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:07 2003] [notice] Child 2772: Acquired the start mutex.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:07 2003] [notice] Child 2772: Starting 450 worker threads.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:36 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:37 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 3096
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:37 2003] [notice] Child 3096: Child process is running
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:37 2003] [notice] Child 3096: Acquired the start mutex.
[Tue Jul 08 15:27:37 2003] [notice] Child 3096: Starting 450 worker threads.
[Tue Jul 08 15:33:41 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Tue Jul 08 15:33:41 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 564
[Tue Jul 08 15:33:41 2003] [notice] Child 564: Child process is running
[Tue Jul 08 15:33:41 2003] [notice] Child 564: Acquired the start mutex.
[Tue Jul 08 15:33:41 2003] [notice] Child 564: Starting 450 worker threads.

Seems to occur for every web access.

----------------------------------------------------
creator: udaya@cctl.poports.co.in
tjcw@us.ibm.com
text:
This is a duplicate of 12340 (I think ...). An alert developer fixed it
somewhere around 2.0.40, but it looks broken again now.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12340 ***

creator: testbotxyz@hotmail.com
